description: Deliciously sweet and sticky duck hotdogs with a zesty and refreshing slaw topping.
name: Duck Dogs with Asian Slaw Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 medium duck breasts, no skin or bone, excess fat removed.
4 medium hot dog buns, sliced in half

recipeInstructions.text: Heat up a non-stick pan to a medium heat and then add the sesame oil.
Chop the duck breasts into bite size portions and then place on the pan and fry while tossing for 6 minutes.
Add the honey, soy and hoisin to the pan and fry for a further 2 minutes while tossing.
Place the cooked duck into the buns, top with Asian slaw and garnish with scallions and crispy onions.
